long_description: Your compass is always as close as your wrist with the Suunto Clipper L-B NH compass. Just clip it on your watchband for quick, easily-accessible navigation. Features a rotating bezel with easy-to-read markings in 10-degree increments, liquid-filled capsule, jewel bearing and hardened steel needle. The Suunto Clipper L-B NH compass also clips to the edge of a map, bag strap or the sleeve of your jacket.
short_description: Your compass is always as close as your wrist with the Suunto Clipper L-B NH compass. Just clip it on your watchband for quick, easily-accessible navigation.
